This method is used to add new Territory to the Map

C

createNewMap(Scanner) - Static method in class Driver.Main
This method lets user to build a new map and then displays the full map to the user on the screen

D

Driver - package Driver
 

E

editMap(Scanner, String) - Static method in class Driver.Main
This method lets user to edit an existing map based on the line number selected and then displays the new map

L

loadMap(Scanner) - Static method in class Driver.Main
This method loads the Map and displays its content.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Driver.Main
This is the main method which runs the program
Main - Class in Driver
This class is the main driver class which interacts with the user and drives the program according to users input
Main() - Constructor for class Driver.Main
 
mapSelection(Scanner) - Static method in class Driver.Main
This method asks user about map selections.

S
